long_description: The REI W22 8 x 40 waterproof binoculars offer big performance at a small price. Enjoy optical quality, ergonomic comfort and a reliably waterproof design when you're hiking, birding or traveling. Fully multicoated lenses using anti-reflective coatings provide superb light transmission, even in low light. BaK4 porro prisms provide a clear, crisp image. Sealed O-rings and nitrogen filling help keep moisture from penetrating inside. Shockproof, rubberized aluminum body stands up to heavy outdoor use. Twist down eyecups and long eye relief make it easy for users wearing glasses to enjoy a full field of view. The REI W22 8 x 40 waterproof binoculars come with a case, neck strap and lens cloth.
short_description: The REI W22 8 x 40 waterproof binoculars offer big performance at a small price. Enjoy optical quality, ergonomic comfort and a reliably waterproof design when you're hiking, birding or traveling.
